item.description:
Folks, this date was the most popular choice for our next meetup in a recent poll I ran. However, the top-choice restaurant wasn't available so I went exploring on line to see if another interesting option might be available.

Scutra, a small family-owned and run restaurant near Arlington Center, has been on my radar screen for some time. However, it wasn't until it turned up in my search that I actually checked out the menu. . . and I had to restrain myself from heading over there for dinner immediately!! Please check it out. . . I'm pretty sure at least some of you will have the same reaction! Several reviewers describe the place as a neighborhood gem, so let's go see if it lives up to its press.

I've made an early reservation so we will hopefully be able to chat and get to know each other a bit before the noise level gets too high! And there appear to be a number of wines available by the glass so we can play the "taste-and-guess" game that was so much fun at our recent Sabur meetup.

Your reservation fee of $2 is intended to show us that you are committed to coming. If the meetup fills, unpaid RSVPs will lose their place in line. This money is not going into my pocket -- it will be added to the tip for our table.

If you are coming by public transportation and need help getting there, email me and I'll see if I can give you a ride from Alewife station. (Limit 3 people!)
item.how_to_find_us: Reservation will be in my name
item.name: Creative European cuisine with a Belgian influence
